subject: Television
Baseball
Football
lead_paragraph: It was jarring to hear Joe Buck, Fox’s No. 1 baseball and N.F.L. announcer, say he “barely” watched sports during the week. Buck claims he was joking about his TV habits.
snippet: It was jarring to hear Joe Buck, Fox’s No. 1 baseball and N.F.L. announcer, say he “barely” watched sports during the week. Buck claims he was joking about his TV habits.
